section.title: Inserting Cross References
section.p: Cross reference links to Markdown documents or to content inside of them can be inserted by invoking the Link Cross Reference... action from the contextual menu.
Example: This is a cross reference to a heading inside the Markdown document: First Section.

section.title: Inserting Content References
section.p: For referencing reused content from Markdown documents, you can invoke the Reuse Reuse Content... action from the contextual menu.
